MSpeech Settings Logs
Show Hide Settings Show log-file About Exit Management Signal level Start recording Stop recording Settings General settings Record settings Recognize settings Connection settings Commands Hotkeys Log Transmission of text Text correction Speech recognize settings Interface Enable transparency windows Show pop-up messages Language: Recording settings Source: Microphone settings The maximum signal level to start recording: The number of operations to the maximum level to start recording: Minimum signal for the start of auto-recognition: The number of positives to a minimum standard for the start of auto-recognition: Auto-recording Action of button "Stop Recording": Stop recording on the minimum signal level Stop, recognize and run with the minimum signal level Stop recording without the minimum signal level Stop, recognize and run without the minimum signal level Connection settings Connect via a proxy server Proxy-server address: Port: Proxy server requires authentication User: Password: Enable hotkeys Hotkeys Assign Delete Clear log Enable transmission of the text in the input field of other programs Setting the transmission of the text in the input fields other programs The method of sending text: Class input fields of the recipient: WARNING! The recognized text will be sent to the active window. Class input field can be left blank or specify using the optional SearchApplicationClassName.exe WARNING! The recognized text will be sent to the inactive window. The 'Window title' must contain an accurate and complete name of the title bar of the program receiving the data. Save settings Main language of speech recognition: Additional language speech recognition: ASR type: Run program Close program Kill program TextToSpeech List of commands Keyword: Command: Type: Add Change Delete Send text to inactive window (WM_COPYDATA) Program title of recipient: Enable text correction during transmission Settings Replace the words in the list Take the first letter of sentence Replace list of words Replace at: Add Change Delete EXE-file and exit the program: EXE-file kills the program: What to say: Text-to-voice Loading, please wait... Copy Select all Log file name: Delete logs Refresh Total lines: %d Time to all lines: %.2f ms Logging Enable logging The maximum size of the log file (Kb) Enable text-to-voice Settings Synthesis system: Voice: Volume: Speed: List of synthesized words Text: Event type: Status: Add <СhangeTextToSpeechButton>Change</СhangeTextToSpeechButton> Delete Error recognize Command not recognized Command not found Communication error Enable Disable Enable filters Filter settings Filter type Sinc Filter settings Voice Filter settings Filter type: LowFreq: HighFreq: KernelWidth: WindowType: Enable AGC (Automatic gain control) Enable noise reduction Enable VAD (Voice Activity Detection) Default command: Run if the command is not found in the list.
